title: The grandson of the Prophet, Imam Hussein ibn Ali’s martyrdom with seventy-two members of the ahlul-bayt (the Prophet’s household) in 680 CE provides the paradigmatic event in Shi‘i historiography and the matrix for later Shi‘i discourses on persecution, perseverance, sacrifice and, ultimately, martyrdom.
